oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dashing Georgia Tom
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Musicians
Dorsey, Thomas Andrew, -- 1899- ; African American composers; African Americans; Gospel musicians
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Young man in hat, with cigarette. .
This photograph shows Tom Dorsey as a handsome young man. He is reputed to have played in nightclubs and brothels before he turned to religion and began to write gospel songs.
